revised_title: Roman Inscription and the Catuvellauni Nation
tldr: Dr. James Jurin discovered a Roman inscription in the North of England, which he transcribed and analyzed. The inscription, found on a wall, belonged to the Catuvellauni nation, a powerful ancient British tribe. The text provides insights into the history of the tribe and its relationship with the Romans, including their leader Cassivellaunus.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
